file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-24-01-05 - PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - ADJUSTMENT/TEST EFFECTIVITY: NOT APPLICABLE TO DISPOSABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do a hydrostatic check of the portable fire extinguishers. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NOT APPLICABLE TO PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - HY- DISPOSABLE FIRE EX- 26-24-01-700-801-A ♦ DROSTATIC CHECK TINGUISHERS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-24-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-01-700-801-A EFFECTIVITY: NOT APPLICABLE TO DISPOSABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS 2. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - HYDROSTATIC CHECK A. General (1) To do this check, it is necessary to remove the fire extinguisher from the aircraft. (2) To do the task, refer to the manufacturer's instructions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-24-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 26-24-01-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Get access to the applicable portable fire extinguisher. (2) Remove the portable fire extinguisher (AMM TASK 26-24-01-000-801-A/400). J. Hydrostatic Check of the Portable Fire Extinguisher SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Do a hydrostatic test of the portable fire extinguisher. Refer to the applicable fire extinguisher component maintenance manual or to the instructions on the fire extinguisher bottle. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-24-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the applicable portable fire extinguisher (AMM TASK 26-24-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Put the aircraft back to its usual configuration. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 700-801-A/500 26-24-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
